subdisciplines.name: Algorithm Design and Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The study of designing and analyzing algorithms, including developing efficient algorithms and proving their correctness.

subdisciplines.name: Computational Complexity
subdisciplines.description: The study of the resources (such as time and space) needed to solve computational problems.

subdisciplines.name: Distributed Algorithms
subdisciplines.description: The study of algorithms for distributed systems, where multiple computers must work together to achieve a common goal.

subdisciplines.name: Numerical Algorithms
subdisciplines.description: The study of algorithms for numerical computation, including methods for solving equations and optimization problems.

subdisciplines.name: Parallel Algorithms
subdisciplines.description: The study of algorithms for parallel computing, where multiple processors work together to solve a problem.
